Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item holds a significant value to me, as it represents years of dedication and innovation. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection. Considering its worth, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $12000. I trust this offer reflects both the value of the product and my commitment to finding it a deserving home with someone who appreciates its true worth. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
